title: A Vatican Auditor Says He Dug Up Too Much Dirt, and Was Buried
description: Libero Milone is suing the Vatican for wrongful dismissal after he said he found cardinals siphoning off funds. The Vatican has hit him with a criminal investigation of its own.
dc:creator: Jason Horowitz
media:description: Pope Francis meeting with Libero Milone, now a former Vatican auditor general, in a 2016 photo released by a Vatican newspaper.
